comments.en: 1 toner cartridge for each color, imaging drum

Very Cheap color laser printer. Uses a proprietary protocol, no PCL or PostScript. OEMed, probably from OAK Technologies. Will most probably not work with the "foo2zjs" (Zenographics protocol) driver.

Color LaserJet 1500L with multi-purpose tray only, Color LaserJet 1500 with additional 250-sheets tray.
